snippet: An effort to identify illegal immigrants who committed crimes led to confusion among authorities before it started to yield results, according to two reports from the inspector general.
abstract: Homeland Security Dept inspector general issues back-to-back reports about the expansion of the Secure Communities program, purpose of which is to identify illegal immigrants who committed crimes; reports find that effort initially led to confusion among authorities before it started to yield results.
lead_paragraph: An effort to identify illegal immigrants who committed crimes led to confusion among authorities before it started to yield results, according to two reports from the inspector general.

headline.seo: Mixed Reviews on Program for Immigrants with Criminal Records
headline.main: Mixed Reviews on Program for Immigrants With Records
headline.print_headline: Mixed Reviews On Program For Immigrants With Records
